text: 10 Books Every Programmer Should Read
translation: 每个程序员都应该阅读的10本书

text: Reading is a vital skill in finding a desirable programming job
translation: 阅读是找到理想编程工作的一项至关重要的技能

text: Did I miss a cool project? Let us know which projects or languages deserve more love and attention!
translation: 我错过了一个很棒的项目吗？ 让我们知道哪些项目或语言值得更多的关注和关注！

text: 10 Books Every Programmer Should Read
translation: 每个程序员都应该阅读的10本书

text: Reading is a vital skill in finding a desirable programming job
translation: 阅读是找到理想编程工作的一项至关重要的技能

text: Thanks for reading! Stay awesome.
translation: 谢谢阅读！ 保持好状况。

text: New Upcoming JavaScript Features — 2019, 2020 and Beyond
translation: 即将到来的JavaScript新功能-2019、2020年及以后

text: A peek into the future on what’s coming to the JavaScript language
translation: 窥视JavaScript语言的未来

text: Always Bet on JavaScript
translation: 始终押宝JavaScript

text: We can say with confidence that 2010s was the decade of JavaScript. We’ve seen a massive spike of JavaScript growth, and it doesn’t seem to be slowing down.
translation: 我们可以充满信心地说2010年是JavaScript的十年。 我们已经看到JavaScript增长迅猛，而且似乎并未放缓。

text: JavaScript developers have been taking some abuse by being called “not real developers.” JavaScript is the heart of any big tech company, such as Netflix, Facebook, Google, and many more. Therefore, JavaScript as a language is as legitimate as any other programming language. Take pride in being a JavaScript developer. After all, some of the coolest and most innovative stuff has been built by the JavaScript community.
translation: JavaScript开发人员被称为“非真正的开发人员”，因此受到了一些滥用。JavaScript是Netflix，Facebook，Google等许多大型科技公司的心脏。 因此，JavaScript作为一种语言与任何其他编程语言一样合法。 以成为JavaScript开发人员而感到自豪。 毕竟，JavaScript社区已经构建了一些最酷，最具创新性的东西。

text: Almost all websites are leveraging JavaScript to some degree. How many websites are out there? Millions!
translation: 几乎所有网站都在一定程度上利用了JavaScript。 有多少个网站？ 百万！

text: New Upcoming JavaScript Features — 2019, 2020 and Beyond
translation: 即将到来的JavaScript新功能-2019、2020年及以后

text: A peek into the future on what’s coming to the JavaScript language
translation: 窥视JavaScript语言的未来

text: It has never been a better time to be a JavaScript developer. Salaries are on the rise, the community is as alive as ever, and the job market is huge. If you’re curious to learn JavaScript, the “You Don’t Know JS” book series was a fantastic read.
translation: 成为JavaScript开发人员从来没有比现在更好。 薪水不断上涨，社区一如既往地活跃，就业市场巨大。 如果您想学习JavaScript，那么“ You Do n't Know JS”系列丛书非常适合阅读。

text: I wrote earlier on the subject of what makes JavaScript popular — you should probably read that too.
translation: 我之前写过关于JavaScript受欢迎的原因-您可能也应该读过。

text: React Will Continue to Reign
translation: 反应将继续统治

text: React is by far the most popular JavaScript library for front end development, and for a good reason too. It’s fun and easy to build React apps. The React team and community have done a splendid job as far as the experience goes for building applications.
translation: 到目前为止，React是最流行的前端开发JavaScript库，这也是有原因的。 构建React应用很有趣且容易。 就构建应用程序的经验而言，React团队和社区所做的出色工作。

text: I’ve worked with Vue, Angular, and React, and I think they’re all fantastic frameworks to work with. Remember, the goal of a library is to get stuff done, so focus less on the flavor, and more on the getting stuff done. It’s utterly unproductive to argue about what framework is the “best.” Pick a framework and channel all your energy into building stuff instead.
translation: 我曾经使用过Vue，Angular和React，并且我认为它们都是可以使用的出色框架。 请记住，库的目标是完成工作，因此，应将精力集中在完成工作上，而不是集中在风味上。 争论什么是“最佳”框架是完全没有用的。选择一个框架并将所有精力用于构建东西。

text: If you’re feeling inspired, pick something from this list and start building today!
translation: 如果您觉得自己受到启发，请从此列表中选择一些内容，并立即开始构建！

text: Web Assembly Will See More Light
translation: Web组装将看到更多光

text: WebAssembly (abbreviated Wasm) is a binary instruction format for a stack-based virtual machine. Wasm is designed as a portable target for compilation of high-level languages like C, C++, and Rust. Wasm also enables deployment on the web for client and server applications. PWAs can use wasm too.
translation: WebAssembly（缩写为Wasm）是基于堆栈的虚拟机的二进制指令格式。 Wasm被设计为可移植的目标，用于编译C，C ++和Rust等高级语言。 Wasm还支持在Web上为客户端和服务器应用程序进行部署。 PWA也可以使用wasm。

text: In other words, Web Assembly is a way to bridge JavaScript technologies with more level technologies. Think of using a Rust image processing library in your React app. Web assembly allows you to do that.
translation: 换句话说，Web Assembly是将JavaScript技术与更高级别的技术联系起来的一种方法。 考虑在您的React应用程序中使用Rust图像处理库。 Web程序集允许您执行此操作。

text: Performance is key, and as the amount of data grows, it will be even harder to keep a good performance. That’s when low-level libraries from C++ or Rust come into play. We’ll see bigger companies adopting Web Assembly and snowball from there.
translation: 性能是关键，随着数据量的增长，保持良好性能将变得更加困难。 那就是C ++或Rust的低级库发挥作用的时候。 我们将看到更大的公司从那里开始采用Web Assembly和Snowball。

text: Progressive Web Apps Are a Force to Reckon With
translation: 渐进式Web应用程序是不可忽视的力量

text: Progressive Web Apps (PWA) is a new approach to building applications by combining the best features of the web with the top qualities of mobile apps.
translation: 渐进式Web应用程序（PWA）是一种通过将Web的最佳功能与顶级质量的移动应用程序相结合来构建应用程序的新方法。

caption: Photo by Rami Al-zayat on Unsplash

text: There are way more web developers in the wild than native platform-specific developers. Once big companies realize that they can repurpose their web devs to make progressive web applications, I suspect that we’ll be seeing a huge wave of PWAs.
translation: 与本地特定于平台的开发人员相比，有更多的Web开发人员在狂奔。 一旦大公司意识到他们可以重新利用其Web开发人员来开发渐进式Web应用程序，我怀疑我们将会看到大量的PWA。

text: It will take a while for bigger companies to adapt, though, which is pretty normal for technology. The progressive part would generally fall towards the front end development since it’s mostly all about interacting with the Web Workers API (Native Browser API).
translation: 但是，较大的公司需要一段时间才能适应，这对于技术而言是很正常的。 渐进式部分通常会落到前端开发中，因为它主要是与Web Workers API（本机浏览器API）进行交互。

text: Web apps aren’t going anywhere. More people are catching onto the idea that writing a single cross-compatible PWA is less work and more money for your time.
translation: 网络应用程序无处不在。 越来越多的人开始意识到这样的想法：编写单个交叉兼容的PWA可以减少工作量，并为您节省更多时间。

text: Today is a perfect day to start learning more about PWAs, start here.
translation: 今天是开始更多了解PWA的完美之日，从这里开始。

text: GraphQL Adoption Will Continue to Grow
translation: GraphQL的采用将继续增长

text: As our applications grow in complexity, so do our data consumption needs. I’m a big fan of GraphQL, and I’ve used it many times. I think it’s a far superior solution to fetching data compared with a traditional REST API.
translation: 随着应用程序复杂性的增长，我们对数据消耗的需求也在增加。 我是GraphQL的忠实拥护者，并且已经使用了很多次。 与传统的REST API相比，我认为这是一种非常出色的获取数据的解决方案。

text: While typical REST APIs require loading from multiple URLs, GraphQL APIs get all the data your app needs in a single request.
translation: 虽然典型的REST API需要从多个URL进行加载，但是GraphQL API可以在单个请求中获取应用程序需要的所有数据。

text: GraphQL is used by teams of all sizes in many different environments and languages to power mobile apps, websites, and APIs.
translation: 在各种不同环境和语言中，各种规模的团队都使用GraphQL为移动应用程序，网站和API提供支持。

text: If you’re interested in learning GraphQL, check out this tutorial I wrote.
translation: 如果您有兴趣学习GraphQL，请查看我编写的本教程。

text: Rust Will Become Mainstream
translation: 锈将成为主流

text: Rust is a multi-paradigm system programming language focused on safety — especially safe concurrency. Rust is syntactically similar to C++, but it’s designed to provide better memory safety while maintaining high performance.
translation: Rust是一种专注于安全性（尤其是安全并发性）的多范式系统编程语言。 Rust在语法上与C ++类似，但其目的是在保持高性能的同时提供更好的内存安全性。

text: We’ve seen four years of strong growth of the Rust programming language. I believe 2020 is the year Rust will officially become mainstream. What is mainstream is up for self-interpretation, but I believe schools will start introducing Rust to their curriculum. This will create a new wave of Rust engineers.
translation: 我们已经看到了Rust编程语言四年来的强劲增长。 我相信2020年将是Rust正式成为主流的一年。 主流是可以自我解释的，但是我相信学校将开始在他们的课程中引入Rust。 这将引起Rust工程师的新浪潮。

caption: Most loved programming languages from the 2019 StackOverflow Survey.

text: Rust has proven itself to be a great language with a vibrant and active community. With Facebook building Libra on Rust — its the biggest project ever — we’re about to see what Rust is really made off.
translation: Rust拥有强大而活跃的社区，已证明自己是一门伟大的语言。 随着Facebook在Rust（有史以来最大的项目）上构建Libra，我们将看到Rust真正产生了什么。

text: If you’re looking to learn a new language, I would strongly recommend learning Rust. If you’re curious to learn more, I’d start learning Rust from this book. Go Rust!
translation: 如果您想学习一种新的语言，我强烈建议您学习Rust。 如果您想了解更多信息，请从本书开始学习Rust。 去生锈！

text: 2020 and Beyond Programming Trend Predictions
translation: 2020年及以后的编程趋势预测

text: Predicting what programming technologies will emerge in 2020
translation: 预测2020年将出现哪些编程技术

caption: Photo by Safar Safarov on Unsplash

text: 2020 is almost here, as crazy as that sounds. The year 2020 sounds like it’s derived from science fiction, yet here we are — about to knock on its front door.
translation: 2020年即将到来，听起来如此疯狂。 2020年听起来像是科幻小说，但是我们要敲开它的前门了。

text: If you’re curious about what the future might bring to the programming world, you’re in the right place. I might be completely wrong — don’t quote me on this— but here’s what I think will happen. I can’t predict the future, but I can make educated guesses.
translation: 如果您对未来可能带给编程世界的好奇，那么您来对地方了。 我可能完全错了-对此不做报价-但我认为这将会发生。 我无法预测未来，但是我可以做出有根据的猜测。

text: “The best way to predict your future is to create it.”
translation: “预测未来的最佳方法是创造未来。”

text: ― Abraham Lincoln
translation: - 亚伯拉罕·林肯

text: (本文翻译自Indrek Lasn的文章《2020 and Beyond Programming Trend Predictions》，参考：https://medium.com/better-programming/2020-programming-trend-predictions-a5d6b70bec26)
translation: （本文翻译自Indrek Lasn的文章《 2020年及超越编程趋势预测》，参考：https：//medium.com/better-programming/2020-programming-trend-predictions-a5d6b70bec26）
